certifications.title: ISRO IIRS program | Exploring Earths Moon with Chandrayaan

education.field_of_study: Computer Science Engineering with specialization in AI and ML

projects.name: Odysseus (Autonomous Maze-Solving Robot)
projects.description: Developing an IEEE Micromouse, an autonomous maze-solving robot, leading a 12-member team, focusing on algorithm design, AI implementation, and optimization for competition readiness by May 2024.

projects.name: Emotion Detection Using Video
projects.description: Implemented real-time emotion detection through video leveraging Scikit-learn, OpenCV, and TensorFlow, focusing on facial expression recognition and analysis and got accuracy upto 85% in collaboration with a 3-member team.

projects.name: Fitness App (Comprehensive Health and Fitness Web Application)
projects.description: A web-based platform leveraging HTML, CSS, JavaScript for frontend backend functionalities managed via Google Firebase. Offers exercises, water intake reminders, calorie calculation, motivation, nutrition tips, and exercise scheduling for holistic health and fitness management.

experiences.description: Implemented SEO strategies and optimizations for the VLink Website, enhancing its search engine visibility and traffic. Contributed to Front-end Development tasks, gaining practical experience in building user-facing aspects of web applications under the guidance of VP-Engineering. Wrote and published 30+ blogs focused on technology for SEO content, driving engagement and improving website ranking.

Contributed significantly to front-end development tasks, acquiring hands-on experience in enhancing website interfaces and user experiences. Implemented responsive design principles, ensuring seamless accessibility across various devices, thereby improving user engagement. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate design concepts into the development process, fostering a cohesive and user-friendly website experience.
